name: brally (alpha)
description:
the alpha version of my game brally, which will soon be on steam

Comands 

WASD- Moviment

PageUp- Up gear

PageDown- Down gear

Space- Handbrake

Alt+F4- Exit Game

C- Change Camera

!Warning!

this game may not work on some computers

soon you will have the option to choose the settings for the best performance
